data.title: Venkatesh Daggubati : Age, Height, Career, Movies, Net Worth
data.meta_description: Venkatesh Daggubati is a famous South Indian actor. He was born on 13 December 1960 in Andhra Pradesh. His height is 6.0 feet.
data.text:
He is a famous South Indian actor. He is counted among the top actors of the 80’s and 90’s. He has been active in Telugu films for 37 years. He has also worked in Hindi films which became blockbusters. He was born on 13 December 1960 in Andhra Pradesh. He also comes second among the richest persons of South Film Industry. His height is 6.0 feet. His weight is 78 kg.

After coming to India from America, he was interested in becoming a film producer like his father. On the advice of his father, he decided to do acting. In the year 1986, he made his debut with Kaliyuga Pandavulu, which was a superhit at the box office. After this, the Film offers kept coming. Before working in films, he had worked as a child artist in some films. Because many of his films were hits, he is called Victory Venkatesh. He has given films after films. After this he never looked back.

His father’s name is Daggubati Rama Naidu and mother’s name is Rajeshwari. His father is also a film producer. His elder brother’s name is Daggubati Suresh Babu. Who is a well-known producer. Rana Daggubati is his son. His younger sister Name is Lakshmi Daggubati.His younger sister was married to Akkineni Nagarjuna. However, they later got divorced. His sister has a son whose name is Naga Chaitanya. Venkatesh was married to Neerja in the year 1985. They have four children. In which there is one son and three daughters. The son’s name is Arjun and the daughters’ names are Aashritha, Bhavana, Hayavahini.
